about_the_game:
Description.

Living Sim is a realistic and immersive life simulation where you will have to deal with everyday challenges in a vast open world inspired by a Brazilian city. Take control of your routine and live how you want, with complete freedom to explore, work, shop, take care of your home and even bond with a faithful canine companion.

Key Features:

Work and Career

Build your career with a series of jobs available, from a job at a stocking supermarket, a job at a water center controlling water leaks, a job as an electrician at a power station controlling electrical faults

Economy and Consumption

Manage your finances carefully! Buy groceries at the market and drinks, buy a car of your choice to get around the dealership.

Home Life and Realistic Interactions

Life at home is full of details: every piece of furniture, appliance and decorative item can be purchased on the in-game tablet in the online store to personalize your home. Invest in the home of your dreams, buying furniture, electronics and decorating each room the way you prefer. Take care of your dog and build a bond with him by listening to his happy barks when you get home and keeping him fed.

Vehicles and City Exploration

Visit the dealership and choose from a variety of vehicles to explore the city in style. Each car has unique characteristics, and you can change them. Take care of your car so it doesn't end up stranded on the road and always remember to keep the tank full!

Needs and Survival System

Live a deep simulation experience with a hunger and thirst system. Visit the grocery store regularly to restock your fridge and always have a bottle of water on hand. Pay attention to your food stock and plan your purchases well so you don't run out of essential ingredients to prepare your meals.

Real Economy and Progression System

Every decision directly affects your financial progress. Plan wisely to acquire valuable possessions, such as vehicles and home improvements. Complete jobs, get rewards and manage your money responsibly.

Interactive Environment and Open World

Feel free to explore the world around you! Visit places, meet people and complete tasks your way. Each part of the city is designed to offer an immersive experience with dynamic interactions that make the city vibrant and realistic.

Living Sim offers a complete virtual life experience, where you can build your own story, create your path and live an exciting routine in a city inspired by urban culture. Work hard, make friends, and build the life you want in this immersive open-world simulator.

name: Living Sim

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470 CPU @ 3.20GHz (4 CPUs), ~3.2GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 550, 4GB, GDDR5
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card is DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Optional: SSD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700E Q2'19 @4.40 GHz@12 MB Cache
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 2048SP, 8GB, GDDR5, 256 Bit
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card is DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD: Recommended

short_description: Take control of your routine and live how you want Work Explore the map buy what you want simulating real life.
